    • Constructor Detail

      • QueryOfficeResults

        public QueryOfficeResults()
        The default constructor. Initialize the query to "", the offices array to null, the officesNum to 0, the page to 1 and calculate the rest of the attributes.

      • QueryOfficeResults

        public QueryOfficeResults(java.util.List<Person> persons)
        Constructor. Initialize the query to "Persons", the page to 1, use a persons list to initialize the Offices array and calculate the rest of the attributes.

      • calculatePages

        public void calculatePages()
        Calculate the number of pages to show the results, and the number of results to show with the last page.

      • getResultsPage

        public java.util.List<Office> getResultsPage(int page)
        Return a list with the offices to show in a certain results page.
        Parameters:
        page - The results page number where the offices will be showed
        Returns:
        A list of offices. The number of offices inside the list depends on whether it is to show the last page (should be at least 1 and at most 4), or are from another page (shown 4 offices per page).

      • getResultsActualPage

        public java.util.List<Office> getResultsActualPage()
        Return a list with the offices to show in the actual results page.
        Returns:
        A list of offices. The number of offices inside the list depends on whether it is to show the last page (should be at least 1 and at most 4), or are from another page (shown 4 offices per page).

      • nextPage

        public void nextPage()
        Increase the page counter.
